name: Snake Simulator: Snakey
description:
Snake Simulator : Snakey is a cute animal game where you have to guide Snake through fun and cute mazes. Complete mazes by running as fast as possible to beat your best timings or enjoy the beautiful and stunning mazes combined with some cute music.

        ✪  Fun puzzle game                                 
        ✪  Cute animations                         
        ✪  Multiple pathways in mazes to choose from      
        ✪  Multiple characters to choose from (New female character added)
        ✪  Great game to kill time                 
        ✪  Simple plain fun                     

                         ***Please do write a review if you like the game :D***           
                       
 Music Credits : https://www.bensound.com

Just rate if you don't feel like writing a review :D
